name: Bus Simulator 23
description:
Bus Simulator 23 is a short narrative game about driving through the countryside of your childhood town, navigating your way to the different stops on your route while reconnecting with your old friend Katrine.



Features
  • Drive a bus
  • Talk to Katrine
  • Explore your childhood town



Gameplay
Drive your bus and use the map to find all of the bus stops on your route.
Interact with everything on your bus from changing gear to switching on the radio.
